metadata.title: DeprecCalc - Phone Depreciation Cost Calculator
metadata.description: A professional tool to accurately calculate the ownership cost of iPhone and Android phones. Supports new and used phone purchases with tiered depreciation models to help you make informed purchasing decisions.
metadata.keywords: iPhone, Android, Samsung, Pixel, depreciation, cost calculator, used phone, ownership cost, depreciation rate

header.title: Phone Ownership Cost Calculator

androidDepreciationInfo.title: Android Depreciation Rate Information:
androidDepreciationInfo.flagship: • Flagship (Galaxy S/Pixel): 50-65% annual depreciation rate, Pro version usually retains value 5% better
androidDepreciationInfo.midrange: • Mid-range: About 50% annual depreciation rate, affordable but lower value retention
androidDepreciationInfo.used: • Used Android recommended 10% constant depreciation rate (already past initial depreciation period)

shopeeFeeInfo.title: Shopee Fee Information:
shopeeFeeInfo.normal: • Non-promotional period: Transaction fee 5.5% + Payment service fee 2% = 7.5%
shopeeFeeInfo.promo: • Promotional period: Transaction fee 7.5% + Payment service fee 2% = 9.5%
shopeeFeeInfo.cap: • Some items have NT$15,000 fee calculation cap
